items.title: Agnellis in talks over Iveco sale, Tata Motors has made approach: Report
items.description: Tata Motors has approached Exor, the Agnellis' investment company, over its controlling stake in Iveco Group, two of the sources said

items.title: Reckitt Benckiser sells homecare brands to Advent in $4.8 billion deal
items.description: Reckitt said it will retain a 30% stake in the business, whose brands include Air Wick air fresheners and Cillit Bang cleaners. The enterprise value includes up to about $1.3 billion of contingent and deferred consideration.

items.title: Rare earth crisis may see India push through new minerals bill in the monsoon session
items.description: The bill may also enable the National Mineral Exploration Trust to use its funds for mine development, apart from exploration in India as well as overseas.

items.title: Rare earth crisis draws PMO's attention, GMDC shares up 13% ahead of stakeholder meeting
items.description: GMDC has stated intentions of entering the critical mineral space, including rare earth, and the company has been working towards this, through it has not officially disclosed details of its plans yet.

items.title: 360 ONE Wealth delivers a healthy Q1, what holds next?
items.description: Earnings visibility remains strong, and growth from inorganic expansion holds the potential to surprise positively

items.title: Axis Bank Q1 FY26 – Can it bounce back after a quarter of misses?
items.description: Challenges remain and a gradual recovery is likely from FY27

items.title: Indian Hotels Company: Growth momentum to sustain
items.description: IHCL, with a comprehensive product portfolio and expansion plans in an asset-light manner, is well-positioned to ride the industry upcycle

items.title: What India Inc actually needs to take away from brand value rankings
items.description: Today, many American, Chinese, German and Japanese brands are household names around the globe. But how many Indian brands can lay claim to similar global presence or familiarity?

items.title: LTTS Q1 FY26: What to expect from the stock after muted quarterly numbers?
items.description: Q1 miss driven by insipid demand and pressure in the mobility segment

items.title: Uber to invest $300 million in EV maker Lucid as part of robotaxi deal
items.description: Nuro, co-founded and led by former Waymo engineers, has expanded from making last-mile delivery vehicles to providing its self-driving technology for commercial and passenger vehicles

items.title: Wind turbine maker Envision Energy to open 3rd manufacturing unit in India
items.description: The company’s MD said that the union government's proposed mandate to localise within six months of the finalisation of guidelines for OEMs could jack up the price of wind turbines in India.
